faq.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform.

q1.question: What does the platform include?
q1.answer: Our platform covers the complete business lifecycle: lead management, proposals, contracts, invoicing, payments, accounting (double-entry), HR & payroll, project management, and financial reporting. Everything you need to run your operations in one place.

q2.question: Do you support Peruvian tax regulations (SUNAT)?
q2.answer: Yes. We fully support PCGE (Plan Contable General Empresarial) chart of accounts, Peruvian tax calculations, and SUNAT compliance reporting. Our system is designed for businesses operating in Peru.

q3.question: Can I manage multiple companies?
q3.answer: Absolutely. With the Professional and Enterprise plans, you can create and manage multiple organizations from a single account, each with its own books, clients, and team members.

q4.question: How does the Stripe integration work?
q4.answer: We integrate directly with Stripe for payment processing. When you send an invoice, your client receives a secure payment link. We support credit cards, ACH transfers, and wire payments. Payments are automatically reconciled in your books.

q5.question: Do you offer data migration?
q5.answer: Yes. For Professional and Enterprise plans, we offer assisted data migration to help you import your existing chart of accounts, clients, and historical data. Enterprise plans include white-glove migration support.

q6.question: Is the platform available in Spanish?
q6.answer: Yes, the entire platform is fully bilingual (English and Spanish). You can switch languages at any time, and all reports and client-facing documents support both languages.

q7.question: What payment methods do clients have?
q7.answer: Your clients can pay via credit/debit card, ACH bank transfer, wire transfer, and cryptocurrency (USDC). All payment methods are processed securely through Stripe.

q8.question: How secure is my data?
q8.answer: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We use role-based access control (RBAC) with 5 granular roles, audit logging for all sensitive operations, and regular security audits. Your financial data is never shared with third parties.
